price: 23. Ya sólo, biso nde tokitiselaki yo kurani oyo na ndambu ndambu.
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَنزِيلٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nazzalnā ʿalayka al-qur'āna tanzīlan
